algorithm_technique: Iterate through rows, applying the zigzag pattern and skipping alternate cells based on row parity.
problem_summary_simple: Traverse a grid in a zigzag pattern, skipping every other cell.
problem_summary_technical: Row-by-row traversal, alternating direction and skipping cells based on row index parity and column index parity.
key_insights: The traversal direction alternates for each row.
The skipping logic depends on the row index (even/odd) and the column index.
Even rows traverse right, skipping odd columns. Odd rows traverse left, skipping even columns (relative to the start of the row traversal).
